ygData.subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] Monk Quests
ygData.msgSnippet: I have killed dorn many times, and have never seen anything like this.  I do know that he drops a BOOK that can be sold to merchants for about 8pp. I don t
ygData.messageBody:
I have killed dorn many times, and have never seen anything like this. I do
know that he drops a BOOK that can be sold to merchants for about 8pp. I
don't believe Dorn has anything to do LORE wise with the iksar monks, so I
don't believe what is rumored around out there. However, the shackle of
clay can be multiquested, as I created another monk, with the sole purpose
of testing this idea. The early shackles are iksar only, but I believe that
the Shackle of Bronze and above can be worn by humans also, I will confirm
this once I jump in game. Since I have shackle of Bronze. If anyone has
the Shackle of Steel already, could you confirm who can use it, and while
your at it, please post the full stats on shackle of steel please.

If someone is going to do the shackle quests, and they have not finished all
needed factions, but are going to use illlusions or wolf form I suggest
gathering all the items upto the shackle of Copper and getting the box for
shackle of Bronze. the actual shackle is givin out by Master Rinmark in
Timourous Deep. and he initiates the shackle of Steel aswell.


P.S.
since the original poster did not mention the lvl of his monk I did not
bother to post anything, I know of many quests, but I am not gonna post all
of them from lvl's 1 - 60 , so please specify your lvl, and server if you
read this, and maybe I'll send some quests to keep you busy.


Indicus Velox
35 rank in the SwiftTail Caste
Saryrn



I recently got the book. What's it for?

On Thu, Jan 25, 2001 at 08:26:40AM -0500, Thomas Kirchner wrote:
> RE: [EQ-Monks] Monk QuestsThis used to be true, but it no longer drops the
newbie note. Now it's a book about Charassis.
> Even if you multiquested the first shackle, you couldn't wear them,
they're iksar only.
> Fenedar
> Innoruuk
>
> can anyone confirm this.
>
> i remember seeing on the net somewhere that if you kill Dorn (in north
ro, not sure which surname) a Dark elf assassin spawns, if you kill him a
Widow mite spawns and if you kill that it drops the Iskar monk initiation
book (or note) the one they start with and give to their guild master.
according to this web page a human monk could use the scroll to join the
iskar monk guild and thus gain access to the shackle quests...
>
> has anyone ever seen or heard anything like this elsewhere ???
>
